hello,
 i am using JBuilder with junit_831.jar for my projects.
i am troubled in following exceptions.

Loading: <java file>...
Running: <java file>method()...
java.lang.NullPointerException
 at com.blazers.webtoolkit.OracleDAC.getConnection(Unknown Source)
 at com.blazers.webtoolkit.OracleDAC.getConnection(Unknown Source)
 at <particular java file>
 at junit.framework.TestCase.runBare(TestCase.java:138)
 at junit.framework.TestResult$1.protect(TestResult.java:106)
 at junit.framework.TestResult.runProtected(TestResult.java:124)
 at junit.framework.TestResult.run(TestResult.java:109)
 at junit.framework.TestCase.run(TestCase.java:131)
 at utest.Runner$1.run(Runner.java:69)

and 

java.lang.VerifyError: (class: org/apache/log4j/LogManager, method: 
<clinit> signature: ()V) Incompatible argument to function
	at org.apache.log4j.Logger.getLogger(Logger.java:94)
	at <java file>.suite(<java file>:17)

i hope anybody will help me for further implementation.

Thanks &regards
Pazhamalai Nathan.
